mapper.insert: insert into board (boardWriter, boardPass, boardTitle, boardContents) values(#{boardWriter},#{boardPass},#{boardTitle},#{boardContents})
mapper.select: select id, boardTitle, boardWriter, boardHits, date_format(createdAt, "%Y-%m-%d") as createdAt from board order by id desc
mapper.update: update board set boardHits=boardhits + 1 where id=#{id}
update board set boardTitle=#{boardTitle}, boardContents=#{boardContents} where id = #{id}
